memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 5 items in this auction, with a total profit of $14100.:
  * Won Implement G at $3200 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Mechanism J at $4200 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Machine P at $5500 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Doodad D at $2500 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Gizmo F at $2500 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 5 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8900.:
  * Won Gadget B at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Utensil N at $4900 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Equipment E at $2500 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1500 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Appliance O at $5000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
